name: Voto impresso no Brasil  / Printed vote in Brazil
description:
Brasil, ao propor a retomada do voto impresso, adiciona a máquina do tempo à urna eleitoral. Voltando ao passado, ao golpe, retoma-se a 'cólonialidade' do país. 


Brazil, by proposing the resumption of printed voting, adds the time machine to the ballot box. Going back to the past, to the coup, the country's 'coloniality' is resumed.

Performance. A3 Composition. CMYK.
